* How do.call works
```{r}
m1 <- matrix(
c(rep("M1",3),11:13), nrow = 3
)
m1

m2 <- matrix(c(rep("M2",3),22:24), nrow = 3)
m2
l <- list(m1, m2)
do.call(cbind, l)

```


```{r}
df <- data.frame(gender = c("M", "M", "F", "M", "F"),
  name = c("John", "Andrew", "Rita", "Dave", "Carol"),
  age = c(22,25, 35,28, 31)
)
df$age[df$gender == "M"]
```
Initial loading

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

df <- tribble(
  ~id, ~bp1, ~bp2,
  "A", 100, 120,
  "B", 140, 115,
  "C", 120, 125
)

df |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(bp1, bp2),
    names_to = "bp",
    names_pattern = ".*(\\d)",
    values_to = "value"
  )
```
